biotools.summary:
Scalable Phylogenetic Profiling using MinHash Uncovers Likely Eukaryotic Sexual Reproduction Genes.

Phylogenetic profiling with orthology data.

HogProf is an extensible and tunable approach to phylogenetic profiling using orthology data. It is powered by minhash based datastructures and computationally efficient

bioschemas.name: HogProf
